Package com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.io.avro

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvroMultiDeserializer<T>  
    AvroMultiSerializer<T>  
    AvroMultiWrapper<T>
    A wrapper for Avro serialization that isn't limited to single key and single value schema.
    AvroUtil  
    CombineAvroKeyFileInputFormat<T>
    Custom implementation/extension of the combine file input format designed to combine small Avro files and skip any empty files or bad records.
    CombineAvroKeyFileInputFormat.AvroKeyRecordReaderSkipBad<T>
    This class is here to allow us to override the AvroKeyRecordReader with our own implementation that doesn't throw the "Invalid sync" exception.
    CombineAvroKeyFileInputFormat.DelegatingAvroRecordReader<T>  
    MultiSchemaAvroSerialization<T>
